page.title: 04Pitney,village amenities
page.content: There has been a lot of new property built during the last 20 years and this has brought a large number of people into the village.There are a large number of 'professional' people: school teachers,doctors and dentists. There are 10 farmers whose fields surround the village.There was a Post Office until about 8 years ago when the post_mistress died.Now most villagers go to Langport to collect their pensions and allowances.Now that the school has closed down primary aged children travel to High Ham and St Gilda's Convent in Langport,while the older children attend Huish Episcopi Comprehensive.There are no shops or bus service so that a car is very neccessary to the villagers.
